title: How to unsubscribe from YouControl
description: YouControl is an analytical system providing comprehensive company profiles in Ukraine. To cancel your YouControl subscription, follow these steps:

steps_1.title: Cancel YouControl Subscription via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your YouControl subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the YouControl official website: youcontrol.com.ua.
*   Log in to your YouControl account.
*   Navigate to your account settings or profile section.
*   Look for a 'Subscription' or 'Billing' option.
*   Find the 'Cancel Subscription' or similar button.
*   Follow the on-screen instructions to confirm the cancellation.

steps_2.title: Cancel YouControl Subscription via Customer Support
steps_2.description:
If you encounter any issues during the online cancellation process, you can contact YouControl customer support directly:

*   Contact YouControl customer support directly if you encounter any issues during the cancellation process.

seo_text: Learn how to easily cancel your YouControl subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to manage your YouControl account and stop recurring payments.
